article_title: Small Business Impact On November Mid-Term Elections

article_metadata.author: Jim Blasingame

og.description: Regardless of political party, history informs that the mid-term election in a second term has rarely been fun for any president. Consequently, President Obama’s party isn’t supposed to do well this November. But with a Republicans House majority and Democrat control of the Senate now in jeopardy, this election cycle is [...]
